item.title: Why Cleveland Fed’s Beth Hammack Remains Worried About Inflation: ‘I’m Seeing It In The Services’
item.description: The Personal Consumption Expenditures (PCE) Index, which is the Federal Reserve’s preferred gauge of inflation, rose 0.3% in August, sequentially.
